column4: this question of whether you should wait has come up a lot in irc lately; personally, its only 10 more days...and i'm sure there will be plenty of updates and with the cd coming you might as well
what are you using right now
well im running windows but ive had a 6.06 disk lying around and i was gonna install but i didnt want to screw myself if i couldnt get the adapter to work
i would wait..what wireless are you using...and do you know for sure its supported...because thats the #1 prob for beginners
